moduleMeta.name: subsurfaceFlow
moduleMeta.author: longyinping11@lzb.ac.cn
moduleMeta.description: calculation of exchange rate between groundwater and river: qsub(ground water flow), and subsurface flow from top saturated zone above the groundwater level(lateral flow)

var.name: Dg
var.description: average depth of the unconfined aquifer (m)

var.name: w
var.description: soil moisture for each UZ(Unsaturated Zone)layer,(mm H2O/ mm Soil)

var.name: k0
var.description: saturated hydraulic conductivity (mm H2O/hour) for each UZ(Unsaturated Zone)layer

var.name: anik
var.description: soil anisotropy ratio (>=1.0),varied by landuse type

var.name: wsat
var.description: saturated soil moisture, varied by soil types

var.name: wfld
var.description: soil moisture at field capacity, varied by soil types

var.name: wrsd
var.description: residual soil moisture, varied by soil types

var.name: ss_f
var.description: slope shape (concave or convex) factor,0.03 is for linear or convex slope

var.name: groundWaterFlow
var.description: exchange rate between groundwater and river

var.name: lateralFlow
var.description: subsurface flow from top saturated zone above the groundwater level(lateral flow)
